SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.commodity_id, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.create_date AS createDate, ci.title, ci.name as commodityName, ui.code, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, ui.images FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci on (ci.id = ri.commodity_id) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.id = ri.user_id) WHERE ri.del_flag = 0
AND ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.userName},'%')
ORDER BY ri.create_date DESC

SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.post_id AS postId, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.send_create AS sendCreate, pi.title, tu.AVATAR AS avatar, ui.name as username, ui.images, ui1.name as replyUserName FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN post_info pi ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ri.user_id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu1 ON ( tu1.USER_ID = ri.reply_user_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.user_id = tu.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN user_info ui1 ON (ui1.user_id = tu1.USER_ID) WHERE ri.delete_flag = 0 AND ri.post_id = #{ postId } ORDER BY ri.send_create ASC
